Task_1_Medical_Summarization.Prognosis: Full recovery expected within six months

Task_2_Sentiment_and_Intent.Patient_Utterance: That’s a relief! So, I don’t need to worry about this affecting me in the future?

Subjective.Chief_Complaint: Neck and back pain following MVA (Motor Vehicle Accident).
Subjective.History: Accident occurred Sept 1st. Initial diagnosis of whiplash at Moss Bank A&E.

Objective.Physical_Exam: Full range of movement in neck and back. No tenderness or signs of damage.

Plan.Treatment: Continue routine activities. No further physiotherapy required.
Plan.Follow_up: Return if symptoms worsen. Full recovery expected in 6 months.
